text: Anne Sauvagnargues (born March 16, 1961) is a French philosopher specializing in the work of Gilles Deleuze. == Biography == A former student of the École Normale Supérieure in Fontenay-aux-Roses, she taught at the École normale supérieure of Lyon and has been professor at the University Paris X since 2010,Cf. le décret du 4 novembre 2010 paru au Journal Officiel. She co-heads with Fabienne Brugère the series "Art Line" for the University Press of France. == Bibliography == *In English: # Sauvagnargues, Anne (2013) Deleuze and Art, Trans. by Samantha Bankston.
